onboarding_description_1: Your trusted platform for managing accounts, making payments, applying for loans, and more. Stay connected to your financial world with ease and security. Join us today!
onboarding_description_2: View your savings, checking, and loan accounts all in one place. Check balances, review transactions, and stay on top of your finances wherever you are.
onboarding_description_3: Easily apply for loans, track your loan status, and manage your payments. We make it easy for you to take control of your financial future.
onboarding_description_4: To register, you must already be a member of Dhaka Credit. Please have your registered mobile number ready. If you are not yet a member, please visit your nearest Dhaka Credit Service Center to register for membership and activate online services.
login_instruction: If you are a member of Dhaka Credit and already have a user account, then login.
register_instruction: If you are a member and registered for online service but don't have a user account, then Register now.
product_and_service_instruction: If you want to learn about our products and services, then visit Product & Service.
under_maintenance_message:
We are currently upgrading our system to serve you better.

Please check back shortly!
